description.value:
Activate Cast a Spell

This luminous mica dust fluoresces for a short time after being exposed to significant amounts of magical energy. When a creature fails its save against a cloud of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Revealing Light] created using this catalyst, glowing grains stick to them, causing them to shed dim light in a 20-foot radius for as long as their invisibility is negated by the spell as well as causing them to take a -2 circumstance penalty to Stealth for that duration.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.Effect: Shimmering Dust]
